channel.title: Patch on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Patch on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0.2-2.1: what happened and why the version looks different
item.description: Some of you hit an unexpected issue when installing PrestaShop 9.0.2 from prestashop.com, and some also noticed a slightly unusual version number: 9.0.2-2.1, which has been used since the start of PrestaShop 9 but hadn’t been explicitly explained until now.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0.2 is available
item.description: PrestaShop 9.0.2 is now available! This second patch version represents yet another step in making PrestaShop 9 more reliable. It focuses on fixing some reported issues to provide a more stable and seamless experience for merchants and developers.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0.1 is available
item.description: The first patch version for PrestaShop 9 is now available! This maintenance release focuses on resolving some of the key issues to ensure a smoother experience for all users.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.3 is available
item.description: PrestaShop 8.2.3 is available. It is a security‑driven patch release for the 8.2 branch. Its primary goal is to address an email enumeration vulnerability in the back office password reset feature. A handful of low-risk improvements and bug fixes that have already been validated have also been included.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.2 is available
item.description: PrestaShop 8.2.2 is here! This latest patch version brings a range of updates, addressing reported issues and introducing enhancements to improve the platform for merchants and developers alike.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.1 is available
item.description: The first patch for PrestaShop 8.2 is available. This release contains many bug fixes and improvements, including a new way to handle module filtering in the front office.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.7 Is Available
item.description: A new patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available! This release includes several significant improvements and numerous bug fixes. In this article, we’ll explore these updates in detail.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.6 Is Available
item.description: A new patch version for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 2 security issues.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.5 Is Available
item.description: Another patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available. This release contains interesting improvements as well as a number of bug fixes. In this article, we’ll lean into them because there’s plenty to write about!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.4 Is Available
item.description: It’s been decided to release a security patch for version 8.1 of PrestaShop.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.3 Is Available
item.description: We are entering the new year with the release of PrestaShop 8.1.3. The latest update for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available. This version brings two security updates, addresses close to 30 known issues, and introduces various enhancements.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.11 Is Available
item.description: A security patch for PrestaShop 1.7 is now available.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.2 is available
item.description: The second patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available! This release contains 2 security fixes, over 30 bugs have been fixed and some minor improvements have been integrated.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.1 Is Available
item.description: The first patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available. This release contains a few security fixes, so we highly recommend you to upgrade your shop as soon as possible.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.5 Is Available
item.description: The fifth patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download! This release contains a few security fixes, so we highly recommend you to upgrade your shop as soon as possible.
